job title: Clinical Laboratory Scientist- 5k Sign On Bonus
job description:
(Only QUALIFIED Healthcare Professionals accepted) Medical Technologist - Job Title:Clinical Lab Scientist, FT

Employment Type:Full Time

DUTIES: Performs all tests in lab to obtain data for the physician used in the diagnosis and treatment of disease. Assumes duties of Lab Assistants in their absence. Must be able to work independently and successfully accomplish minor administrative and technical duties normally taken care of by the Chief Medical Technologist. Participates in other duties relevant to laboratory services, patient care, and the safety of hospital employees.

QUALIFICATIONS:Current CA ClinicalLaboratory Scientist license. Current CPR card. Experience in all routine areas of the clinical lab. Microbiology experience strongly preferredor bewilling to be trained in Microbiology. Successful experiencein dealingwith the public. Demonstrated ability to work alone. Ability to meet physical requirements stated ofon Job Description.
Job Added: 08/04/2017
